page.title: 11MY WEEKEND AT HOME
page.content: I am 9 years old and my brother is 6. At the weekend we like to stay in bed till 9a.m. After breakfast we go out in the garden and play on our bikes while Dad is cutting the lawn and weeding the flower beds. Mum goes to Fakenham shopping in her car.Lunch on Saturday is my favourite- fish&chips. After lunch we go swimming at Dereham and I like playing games such as picking up the goggles from the bottom of the pool. When we have had tea we watch television until it is time for bed at 8 o'clock. On Sunday, if the weather is fine, Dad likes to cook a barbecue for dinner in the garden. We often all go for a bike ride and have tea with Nan and Grandad. We like to have egg and cheese salad and doughnuts. We come home at 7p.m.and have a bath and hair wash ready for school next day.
